items.content: Thankyou for playing this game I hope you had a nice time, and also you did not play so much that your eyes hurt or something
Programming by Dany Burton, you can get the source code at https://github.com/marineorganism/leagueOfScumbags
I can assure you that the league of scumbags will return in another game in the near future, and if you did not like it then beware!
A game made by Dany Burton
